channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 09:47 Attention! Drone attack! Perhaps discharges of explosive items! Be in shelters!
item.description: 🟠 09:47 Attention! Drone attack! Perhaps discharges of explosive items! Be in shelters! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:32 Air anxiety in the Chernihiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
